attributes.title: Racist app.
attributes.review: This app is bad, racist and sexist. Who would make this app for a racist man who has history of raping woman. WHO WOULD DO THIS? You can clearly see his messed up motives in statements on this app. All this app is doing is promoting white supremacy and a long history of systematic racism. Why is he still president. AND WHY DOES HE HAVE AN APP🤦🏾‍♂️. He wants to ban tik tok why don’t they ban this

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible. It was very confusing and sent so many notifications, that I would consider it spam. My phone would act up once I downloaded the app. I had high expectations, but this app failed me and I am now going to delete it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP please and thank you❤️

attributes.title: no❤️😺🙈 👁👄👁
attributes.review: Donald Trump raped young women, inappropriately touching YOUNGER women, (photographic evidence is there) admitted to being a sexual predator, (VIDEO evidence is there) has had multiple accounts where he was racist, homophobic, and transphobic, claims to be pro choice but somehow him AND every single supporter I have met deny healthcare as a human right. Biden isn’t and amazing option but he’s the best we have.

attributes.title: This is a bad app
attributes.review: This app was good at first then I kept getting these weird notifications and I kept seeing orange so I deleted it this the worst app I don’t recommend you getting it’s a waist of time

attributes.title: ✨💫🙏This Cheeto app is disgusting 🙏✨💫
attributes.review: First off i would like to start off my saying that this app took 17 weeks to download. when it FINALLY did, it hacked into all my accounts which made me finally have to wipe my phone. 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND GETTING. THIS APP IS AFFILIATED WITH THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT AND WILL STEAL YOU INFORMATION!! Therefore a danger to our great society and should be banned immediately!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Tik Tok 😉😌 btw I’m from Gen Z
attributes.review: Horrible horrible app. When I logged on I saw things I probably shouldn’t have seen I’m just 11 I mean i believe in god to! This is just horrible I can’t believe it. So if you are a trump supporter or you like trump please, I beg you please be aware that you and your little friend trashy trump are going down. Gen-Z gotcha 😉.

attributes.title: Awful!!!
attributes.review: This app is a waste of space it took forever to access and open, not to mention the app was disgusting in terms of organization. Only downloaded so I could understand the presidents plans and actions better, as usual HE FAILED. Couldn’t even make a simple app right.

attributes.title: The worst app in the App Store
attributes.review: This app is offensive to the public and to Apple. I was just trying to access quality information and was meant with what can only be known as offensive and disturbing content. This app must be taken down immediately to spare any adult or child who happens upon it. A real catastrophe!!

attributes.title: Unreliable Information
attributes.review:
After reading some of the articles on the app I decided to fact check some things and EVERYTHING is false!!! This app unsafe for right sided racists
Please save yourself and save your country. Do you own research and don’t just vote for him because you don’t want to vote Democrat.

attributes.title: Hacked all my information
attributes.review: Donald trump is sold my information to the Chinese! I keep getting ads for things I want to buy before I even search it up because Donald is spying on me through this app! Also it crashed every time I tried to use it! Do not get it!
